review_data.title: Insider tip
review_data.content: Dropped by to get one one the best Pizzas in Zurich for the best price. Good for take away as well. Worth going there!

review_data.title: Carini e cortesi
review_data.content: Alle 14.30 cercare un piatto caldo da dare ai bimbi a Zurigo non è semplicissimo. Qui al Goldbrunner la ragazza...More

review_data.title: Busy little bar
review_data.content: Friendly little bar where you can get eat in or take out pasta. Serving good, home made meals. Very friendly staff. Popular in evenings.
